Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN GL Journal Posting Failed With Error28 - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN GL Journal Posting Failed With Error28 - Weekly
Source.Description: Identified journal lines with invalid balancing and management segment value which causing Error28 while posting.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_GL_BATCH_STATUS_ERROR28' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'ledger_id:' || s.ledger_id || ', ledger_name:' || s.ledger_name || ', segment_type_code:' || s.segment_type_code || ', segment_value:' || s.segment_value || ', error_message:' || s.error_message || ', record_id:' || s.record_id key_data FROM (SELECT ledger_id ledger_id, ledger_name ledger_name, segment_type_code segment_type_code, segment_value segment_value, error_message error_message, record_id record_id FROM ( ( SELECT gl.ledger_id ledger_id, gl.name ledger_name, segment_type_code segment_type_code, segment_value segment_value, 'Value Missing in gl_ledger_norm_seg_vals' error_message, parent_record_id record_id FROM apps.gl_ledger_segment_values glsv, apps.gl_ledgers gl WHERE gl.ledger_id = glsv.ledger_id MINUS SELECT gl.ledger_id, gl.name ledger_name, segment_type_code segment_type_code, segment_value segment_value, 'Value Missing in gl_ledger_norm_seg_vals' error_message, record_id record_id FROM apps.gl_ledger_norm_seg_vals glsv, apps.gl_ledgers gl WHERE gl.ledger_id = glsv.ledger_id ) UNION ( SELECT gl.ledger_id ledger_id, gl.name ledger_name, segment_type_code segment_type_code, segment_value segment_value, 'Value Missing in gl_ledger_segment_values' error_message, record_id record_id FROM apps.gl_ledger_norm_seg_vals glsv, apps.gl_ledgers gl WHERE gl.ledger_id = glsv.ledger_id MINUS SELECT gl.ledger_id ledger_id, gl.name ledger_name, segment_type_code segment_type_code, segment_value segment_value, 'Value Missing in gl_ledger_segment_values' error_message, parent_record_id record_id FROM apps.gl_ledger_segment_values glsv, apps.gl_ledgers gl WHERE gl.ledger_id = glsv.ledger_id ) ) where rownum<2 ORDER BY 1, 3, 5 ASC) s
